bask.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to enjoy sitting or lying in the heat of the sun or a fire
bask.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Lizards were basking in the morning sun.
bask.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if a place basks in the sun, it is sunny and warm

bask.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to enjoy the approval or attention that you are getting from other people
